message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. With its advanced features and exceptional quality, it's truly a game-changer in its field. I believe in its value and am confident it will exceed your expectations. Let's discuss how we can bring this remarkable product into your possession.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on your product. However, my budget allows me to spend up to $10000 for this purchase. Would you consider adjusting your price to meet my budget?

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. In light of that, I would like to propose an alternative solution. Instead of purchasing the product outright, I can offer you a financing plan. For instance, you could pay $8000 upfront and then make monthly installments over the next year. This way, you can acquire the product without straining your budget significantly. Please let me know if this option interests you.
